question: The "World Creole Music Festival" is the annual music festival of which country?
explanation: World Creole Music Festival is an annual three-day music festival of the island country of Dominica, officially the Commonwealth of Dominica, launched to promote the Dominican tourism product and create a world-class platform for indigenous Dominican music. Dominica usually celebrates this festival beginning on the final Friday in October each year for three days as a conclusion to Creole heritage month. This music festival is a grand success with the participation of entertainers from the Caribbean, French Antilles, Africa and North America regions.
